attributes.title: FEET PICS???? REALLY???!!!
attributes.review: Instead of it asking for notifications when you download it, it asked for feet pics!!!!!

attributes.title: Don’t delete tiktok
attributes.review: Seriously don’t delete tiktok a lot of young business owners depend on it and it’s not right to take that away!

attributes.title: cheeto
attributes.review: i downloaded this app only to find that an orange face was staring back at me? i don’t appreciate being scared like that when you first open the app. there is nothing worse than seeing your nightmare come to life. please, this app is an abomination to america. #allcountries matter :) rise up friends

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I tried to find reasons for him to be even slightly good but there's literally none. Disgusting

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: After taking a week to download it sent an electric shock through my hand and I am now in the hospital for 9 degree burns.

attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: I wanted to find a reason to like trump but the app kept crashing

attributes.title: 😾horrible app🙀
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and then this fat orange creature came to my door 🙀 he sat there for hours then left. Later on I hear loud noises and the orange creature said “vote 5 stars!!” 😿

attributes.title: 🥰🧚🏻Dear Donald Trump🧚🏻🥰
attributes.review: Dear Donald Trump, banning TikTok will just cause Gen Z to fight back. If you think that banning TikTok is gonna stop us from hurting your feelings, you are very wrong. Just know that there will be a LOT of backlash.

attributes.title: Everyone give one star he is trying to take away tiktok
attributes.review: We won’t go out without a fight

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app gave me a virus. I had spent a bunch of money to fix it. When I gave it my number it started spamming. 🙄
